word:
Love is manifested in kindness, gentleness, forbearance, and longsuffering. The expression of the countenance 
                                                                           240
is changed. The peace of heaven is revealed. There is seen a habitual gentleness, a more than human love. Humanity becomes a partaker of divinity. Christ is honored by perfection of character. As these changes are perfected, angels break forth in rapturous song, and God and Christ rejoice over souls fashioned after the divine similitude.
